resources.string: In order to monitor the strength of wifi connections in your area you need to turn on wifi connectivity

In order to monitor the strength of wifi connections Android also requires to turn on the location.\nThis is because if you monitor the available wifi connection you could get a good approximation of where the device is located. This does not mean that the application will check the device\'s location.
Note that monitor specific settings will only be applied to the selected monitor
This setting controls how frequently a measurement is taken for the monitor. The unit is in minutes
This setting controls how many of the last measurements are counted per area on the grid, when evaluating measurements on the map
This setting controls how long should be the side of the squares in the map grid
Go to the data import/export settings
